pma:database.name: M2L_G4
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `athlete` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nom` text NOT NULL, `prenom` text NOT NULL, `idLigue` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idLigue` (`idLigue`), CONSTRAINT `fk_ligue_athlete` FOREIGN KEY (`idLigue`) REFERENCES `ligue` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `auth_cas` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `service` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `ticket` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `renew` char(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `user_id__idx` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `auth_cas_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `auth_user` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `auth_event` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time_stamp` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `client_ip` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `origin` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `description` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `user_id__idx` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `auth_event_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `auth_user` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=52 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `auth_membership` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `group_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `user_id__idx` (`user_id`), KEY `group_id__idx` (`group_id`), CONSTRAINT `auth_membership_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `auth_user` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `auth_membership_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`group_id`) REFERENCES `auth_group` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `auth_permission` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `group_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `table_name` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `record_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `group_id__idx` (`group_id`), CONSTRAINT `auth_permission_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`group_id`) REFERENCES `auth_group` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `auth_user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `first_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `last_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `registration_key` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `reset_password_key` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `registration_id` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `club` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `libelle` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `idLigue` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idLigue` (`idLigue`), CONSTRAINT `fk_ligue_club` FOREIGN KEY (`idLigue`) REFERENCES `ligue` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `contenir` ( `idJBFD` int(11) NOT NULL, `idFormationJBFD` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idJBFD`,`idFormationJBFD`), KEY `fk_contenir_formationJBFD` (`idFormationJBFD`), CONSTRAINT `fk_contenir_formationJBFD` FOREIGN KEY (`idFormationJBFD`) REFERENCES `formationJBFD` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_contenir_JBFD` FOREIGN KEY (`idJBFD`) REFERENCES `JBFD` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `dateOlympique` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `dateOlympique` date NOT NULL, `idAthlete` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idAthlete` (`idAthlete`), CONSTRAINT `FK_athlete_dateOlympique` FOREIGN KEY (`idAthlete`) REFERENCES `athlete` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `equipe` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `libelle` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `idClub` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idClub` (`idClub`), CONSTRAINT `fk_club_equipe` FOREIGN KEY (`idClub`) REFERENCES `club` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `evenement` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `nom` text NOT NULL, `adresse` text NOT NULL, `remarques` text NOT NULL, `site` text NOT NULL, `dateDebut` date NOT NULL, `dateFin` date NOT NULL, `idLigue` int(11) NOT NULL, KEY `idLigue` (`idLigue`), CONSTRAINT `fk_ligue_evenement` FOREIGN KEY (`idLigue`) REFERENCES `ligue` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `formation` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `libelle` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `lieu` text NOT NULL, `intervenant` text NOT NULL, `audience` text NOT NULL, `objectif` text NOT NULL, `prerequis` text NOT NULL, `contenus` text NOT NULL, `cout` int(11) NOT NULL, `repas` text NOT NULL, `dateLimite` date NOT NULL, `dateDebut` date NOT NULL, `dateFin` date NOT NULL, `heureDebut` int(11) NOT NULL, `heureFin` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `formationJBFD` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `theme` text NOT NULL, `lieu` text NOT NULL, `dateDebut` date NOT NULL, `dateFin` date NOT NULL, `heureDebut` int(11) NOT NULL, `heureFin` int(11) NOT NULL, `intervenant` text NOT NULL, `contenu` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `inscriptionCROSL` ( `idPersonnel` int(11) NOT NULL, `idFormation` int(11) NOT NULL, `dateInscription` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idPersonnel`,`idFormation`), KEY `fk_inscriptionCROSL_formation` (`idFormation`), CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionCROSL_formation` FOREIGN KEY (`idFormation`) REFERENCES `formation` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionCROSL_personnel` FOREIGN KEY (`idPersonnel`) REFERENCES `personel` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `inscriptionJBFD` ( `idPersonnel` int(11) NOT NULL, `idJBFD` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idPersonnel`,`idJBFD`), KEY `fk_inscriptionJBFD_formationJBFD` (`idJBFD`), CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionJBFD_formationJBFD` FOREIGN KEY (`idJBFD`) REFERENCES `formationJBFD` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionJBFD_personnel` FOREIGN KEY (`idPersonnel`) REFERENCES `participer` (`idPersonnel`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `licencie` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `nom` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `prenom` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `nomUtilisateur` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `mdp` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `idEquipe` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idEquipe` (`idEquipe`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `ligue` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nom` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `adresseRue` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `ville` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `cp` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `URLSiteWeb` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `emailContact` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `discipline` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `participer` ( `idPersonnel` int(11) NOT NULL, `idFormation` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idPersonnel`,`idFormation`), KEY `fk_inscriptionCROSL_formation2` (`idFormation`), CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionCROSL_formation2` FOREIGN KEY (`idFormation`) REFERENCES `formation` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_inscriptionCROSL_personnel2` FOREIGN KEY (`idPersonnel`) REFERENCES `personel` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `personel` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `nom` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `prenom` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `adresse` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `idLigue` int(11) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `nomUtilisateur` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idLigue` (`idLigue`), CONSTRAINT `fk_personnel_ligue` FOREIGN KEY (`idLigue`) REFERENCES `ligue` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

table.name: formation
table.column: Pas la finalité, ça c'est sûr.
-Course en sac -Navigation sur internet explorer -Concours de prouts

table.name: formationJBFD
table.column: -Comment choisir son grec. -McDonald, Quick ou Burger King ? -Se faire vomir sans danger.

table.name: formationJBFD
table.column: Nous n'avons pas d'information pour le moment.

table.name: ligue
table.column: Aérodrome de Chambley Planet’Air - 11, bd A. de Saint-Exupéry 54470 HAGEVILLE

table.name: services
table.column: Les ligues disposent d'un accès Internet mutualisé que la M2L loue à un prestataire extérieur.

table.name: services
table.column: Dans tous les espaces, un réseau Wifi "visiteurs" est disponible, avec une clé WPA renouvelée régulièrement et communiquée aux ligues. Ce réseau ne permet que l'accès à Internet.
